messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]BM or to poop or not to poop in the hospital
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/13/02 9:20:16 PM Central Daylight Time, ... OH Yes, god forbid you don t poop at the hospital! They must have stock in it. And don t even
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/13/02 9:20:16 PM Central Daylight Time,
childe@... writes:


> Nancy,
> This cracked me up!!!! It reminds me of when I was in the hospital after
> having both kids. Everyone wanted to know whether or not I'd had a "BM". I
> would take a walk up the hall and the cleaning gal would ask me for crying
> out loud! I was a slow learner but finally figured out they weren't going to
> let me go home until I had.
> Thanks for the laugh,
> Cathy
>

OH Yes, god forbid you don't poop at the hospital! They must have stock in
it. And don't even *think* about being slightly abnormal and not have one but
once every three days or so. The nurse I had with Moly just wouldn't accept
the fact that I had one the day before and wasn't *due* another for one more
day.
~Nancy~ Who has an aversion to going in public anyway and would wait a week
if needed.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
